resources.string: Viegram
Share photos, earn points, gain popularity and have fun competing against friends
You lose the relevant amount of points when losing a follower and when a like on your photo or comment is retracted
We just need your registered email address to send you a OTP verification code.
Please enter OTP sent to your email address
Only people you approve can see your photos when your account is private

Restricting a follower will block them from seeing specific posts that you choose to exclude them from. 
 
 Viegram will not notify

You will no longer see this users posts on your timeline.

 Are you sure you want to unfollow

You've earned 2,500 points for signing up. 
 Share your photos, earn points & have fun! 
 _________________ 
 
 Expand the menu bar at the bottom of your screen to gain access to your account icons, and visit the options screen to invite others and learn exciting ways to earn points.
